name: Deep Live Cam (GPU)
description: GPU-accelerated real-time face swap using webcam, video, or images. Requires GFPGANv1.4 and inswapper_128_fp16.onnx models.

install.command: cd Deep-Live-Cam && venv\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && pip uninstall -y onnxruntime onnxruntime-gpu && pip install onnxruntime-gpu==1.16.3
cd Deep-Live-Cam && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && pip uninstall -y onnxruntime onnxruntime-gpu && pip install onnxruntime-gpu==1.16.3
cd Deep-Live-Cam && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && pip uninstall -y onnxruntime onnxruntime-coreml && pip install onnxruntime-coreml==1.13.1

run.name: Launch Deep Live Cam (GPU - CUDA)
run.command: cd Deep-Live-Cam && venv\Scripts\activate && python run.py --execution-provider cuda

run.name: Launch Deep Live Cam (GPU - CUDA)
run.command: cd Deep-Live-Cam && source venv/bin/activate && python run.py --execution-provider cuda

run.name: Launch Deep Live Cam (CoreML - Apple Silicon)
run.command: cd Deep-Live-Cam && source venv/bin/activate && python3.10 run.py --execution-provider coreml
